News Forms

Django News Portal Forms

This module contains all the form classes for the news portal application. It includes forms for user registration, profile editing, article submission, publisher management, and newsletter creation.

class news.forms.ArticleForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for journalists to submit or edit news articles.

Includes fields for title, content, publisher association, and optional image upload. Styled with Bootstrap CSS classes for consistent appearance.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

fields = ['title', 'content', 'publisher', 'image']
labels = {'content': 'Article Body', 'image': 'Article Image (optional)', 'publisher': 'Publisher Organization', 'title': 'Headline'}
model

alias of Article

widgets = {'content': <django.forms.widgets.Textarea object>, 'image': <django.forms.widgets.ClearableFileInput object>, 'publisher': <django.forms.widgets.Select object>, 'title': <django.forms.widgets.TextInput object>}
base_fields = {'content': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'image': <django.forms.fields.ImageField object>, 'publisher': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'title': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}
declared_fields = {}
property media

Return all media required to render the widgets on this form.

class news.forms.CustomUserSignupForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UserCreationForm

User registration form supporting multiple user roles.

Extends Django’s UserCreationForm to include role selection and email field. Supports registration for readers, editors, journalists, and publishers.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

fields = ['username', 'email', 'role', 'password1', 'password2']
help_texts = {'role': 'Choose your role: Reader, Editor, Journalist, or Publisher.'}
labels = {'role': 'Account Type'}
model

base_fields = {'email': <django.forms.fields.EmailField object>, 'password1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'password2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'role': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>, 'username': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}

class news.forms.NewsletterForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for journalists to create and submit newsletters.

Provides fields for newsletter title, content, and optional publisher association. Automatically filters publisher choices based on the user’s associations.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

help_texts = {'content': 'Write the full newsletter content here.', 'publisher': 'Select a publisher to associate with this newsletter (optional).'}

class news.forms.ProfileEditForm(data=None, files=None, auto_id='id_%s', prefix=None, initial=None, error_class=<class 'django.forms.utils.ErrorList'>, label_suffix=None, empty_permitted=False, instance=None, use_required_attribute=None, renderer=None)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for users to update their profile information.

Allows users to modify their username, email, profile image, contact number, and biographical information. Provides proper validation and Bootstrap styling.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

class news.forms.PublisherForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelForm

Form for creating and editing publisher organizations.

Allows association of editors and journalists with publishers through multi-select fields. Automatically filters user choices based on appropriate roles.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

fields = ['name', 'editors', 'journalists']
help_texts = {'editors': 'Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple editors.', 'journalists': 'Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple journalists.'}
labels = {'editors': 'Editors (users with edit/admin rights)', 'journalists': 'Journalists (users who can submit articles)', 'name': 'Publisher Name'}
model

alias of Publisher
